name: MultiSelectPortal
description: Renders multi-select content in a React Portal to avoid z-index and overflow issues. Does not render any DOM element itself.

props.name: render
props.description:

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: container
props.description: A parent element to render the portal element into.
